verses.verse: Then all the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went out,<WH3318> and the congregation<WH5712> was assembled<WH6950> as one<WH259> man,<WH376> from Dan<WH1835> even to Beersheba,<WH884> with the land<WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> to Yahweh<WH3068> at Mizpah.<WH4709>
